section_title: NATIONAL COMMUNICATIONS FROM NON-ANNEX I PARTIES
sentences: Consideration of the Fourth Compilation and Synthesis of Initial National Communications: This issue was discussed in the SBI Plenary twice.
On Wednesday, 23 October, Chair Estrada said that the Secretariat would prepare a report to be addressed at SBI-18.
On Thursday, 31 October, Parties agreed on the COP draft decision.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
